author: S Sundar
text:
Unidentified persons hurled a crude bomb at the office of Madurai West MLA, Minister for Cooperation Sellur K. Raju, under SS Colony police station limits here on Saturday night.

The police said that no one was injured. A bottle filled with petrol was hurled at the office around 11:30 p.m. Senior city police officials, who visited the scene, said that the motive and people behind the crime were not known.

A similar bomb exploded close to the Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple last week, following a rivalry among street vendors.
title: Bomb hurled at Minister’s office
